Pamela Smith Hudson (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ nwanyị Africa-America na ónyé na-ese ihe na Los Angeles nkè ọrụ nka ya gụnyere ihe osise encaustic, ceramics na nnwale óbíbí akwụkwọ.  Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UCLA, ébé ọ gụrụ nka, akụkọ nka, ọmụmụ ihe ngosi nka, na ịgba egwu. Smith Hudson anọwo na-ekerịta nka ya kemgbe afọ 2015 ma gosipụta ihe ngosi na CAAM, Over the Influence Gallery na gallery E.C.Lina.
